## TxBuilder.useEvaluator() method

Sets the evaluator for the transaction builder. The evaluator is used to execute Plutus scripts during transaction building.

**Signature:**

```typescript
useEvaluator(evaluator: Evaluator, override?: boolean): TxBuilder;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

evaluator


</td><td>

[Evaluator](./sdk.core.evaluator.md)


</td><td>

The evaluator to be used for script execution.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

override


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Whether to override the evaluator if one is already set.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[TxBuilder](./sdk.txbuilder.md)

{<!-- -->TxBuilder<!-- -->} The same transaction builder
